</mxCell> <mxCell id="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-2" value="Accountancy Software" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#006435;fontSize=19;" vertex="1" parent="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-5"> <mxGeometry x="62.33333333333334" y="40" width="45.333333333333336" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-12" value="" style="group;fontFamily=GDS Transport Website;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="570" y="25" width="180" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-10" value="<font color="#005ea5"><span style="font-size: 19px"><b>HMRC API</b></span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#005ea5;fillColor=#F1F7FA;strokeWidth=3;" vertex="1" parent="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-12"> <mxGeometry width="179.99999999999997" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-13" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;fontSize=19;fontColor=#005ea5;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="20" y="150" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="780" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="agcbhiuqCOtzK4CuYZpa-17" value="Customer" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#2e358b;fontSize=19;fontFamily=GDS Transport Website;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="65" width="60" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-12" value="2. The customer receives the prompt in the software and begins their submission process" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="170" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-35" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">5. The software initiates the data submission process by calling the appropirate endpoint</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="440" width="215" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-45" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;comic=0;strokeColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;fillColor=#F4F5F9;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=16;fontColor=#2e358b;gradientColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="64" y="35" width="35" height="38" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-46" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;comic=0;strokeColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;fillColor=#F4F5F9;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=16;fontColor=#2e358b;gradientColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="49" y="73" width="65" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-49" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=16;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeColor=#2E358B;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="64" y="98" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="64" y="119" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-50" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=16;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeColor=#2E358B;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="99" y="98" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="99" y="119" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rGjTTl-umJABn9l_Gm-7-7" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">1. The software prompts the customer when they are due to submit an update</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="170" width="210" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6TB5W7BCPrKqyTUE_rto-6" value="3. The software prepares the summary information and displays it to the customer" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="300" width="210" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-6" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">4. The customer checks the information and submits it</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="358" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-11" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">6. HMRC receives and stores information and provides a success response<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="440" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-21" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-12" target="6TB5W7BCPrKqyTUE_rto-6"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="100" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="485" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-12" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">7. The software receives the success response and confirms with the customer that the update has been received and stored by HMRC</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="570" width="215" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-15" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">8. The customer views the confirmation</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="22.5" y="585" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-18" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">9. The software calls the Trigger a Self Assessment Tax Calculation endpoint to to ensure the obligation is marked as met, once the update&nbsp; completes an obligation period<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="735" width="215" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-23" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">10. HMRC receives the request and returns a Calculation ID (calculationId)<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="542.5" y="927" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-24" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;endArrow=block;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;horizontal=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-18" target="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-23"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="642.5" y="840" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="652.5" y="1015" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" edge="1" parent="1" source="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-25" target="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-25" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">12. The software can use the Calculation ID to call the Retrieve a Self Assessment Tax Calculation endpoint (optional)<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="278.75" y="1060" width="212.5" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-26" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">The customer views the calculation<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="22.5" y="1210" width="200" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-28" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;endArrow=block;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;horizontal=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-8" target="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-26"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="252.5" y="960" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="252.5" y="1020" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-1" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="275" y="219.5" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="230" y="220" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-2" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" <mxPoint x="194" y="625" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-4" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Y4qrJzyw4J2z4k8Yr8JM-35" target="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-11"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="307.23" y="570" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="452.23" y="620" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-5" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-11" target="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-12"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="560" y="630" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="705" y="680" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;endArrow=block;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-12" target="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="375" y="720" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="720.21" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;endArrow=block;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8rDLtezrttqo-IKKuFJy-10" value="" style="endArrow=block;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="6TB5W7BCPrKqyTUE_rto-6" target="H3se9C0y4yH03XXUBBqU-6"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="267.5" y="339" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="230" y="390" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" edge="1" parent="1" source="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-2" target="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-25"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-2" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">11. The software receives the Calculation ID and stores it for future use<br></p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="278.75" y="927" width="212.5" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-4" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=19;fontColor=#2e358b;strokeWidth=3;endFill=1;endArrow=block;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;horizontal=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="L_kI3HofiIU4xcY_kTNb-23" target="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="289" y="1140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="233" y="1140" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-9" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" edge="1" parent="1" source="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-6" target="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-6" value="HMRC returns the calculation" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=#FFFFFF;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="1080" width="190" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18f93Cq6t45Q4-Ww3QNz-8" value="<p></p><p class="MsoNormal">The software receives the calculation and displays it to the customer<br>(optional)</p>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;comic=0;strokeWidth=3;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontStyle=1;rounded=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;spacing=4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="1210" width="210" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: 2. The customer receives the prompt in the software and begins their submission process

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 209px; height: 1px; padding-top: 530px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.p: 5. The software initiates the data submission process by calling the appropirate endpoint

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 204px; height: 1px; padding-top: 260px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 1. The software prompts the customer when they are due to submit an update

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 204px; height: 1px; padding-top: 395px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3. The software prepares the summary information and displays it to the customer

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 448px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 4. The customer checks the information and submits it

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 530px; margin-left: 553px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 6. HMRC receives and stores information and provides a success response

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 209px; height: 1px; padding-top: 675px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 7. The software receives the success response and confirms with the customer that the update has been received and stored by HMRC

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 675px; margin-left: 26px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 209px; height: 1px; padding-top: 855px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 9. The software calls the Trigger a Self Assessment Tax Calculation endpoint to to ensure the obligation is marked as met, once the updateÂ completes an obligation period

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1017px; margin-left: 546px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 10. HMRC receives the request and returns a Calculation ID (calculationId)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1160px; margin-left: 282px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 12. The software can use the Calculation ID to call the Retrieve a Self Assessment Tax Calculation endpoint (optional)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1295px; margin-left: 26px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1017px; margin-left: 282px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: 11. The software receives the Calculation ID and stores it for future use

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 184px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1160px; margin-left: 553px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 204px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1295px; margin-left: 283px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p:
The software receives the calculation and displays it to the customer
(optional)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
